rows.label: qev086201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Friends! We are all friends, indeed?
Which makes us friends in NEED, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0002
rows.name: Uh...what? Sorry, L, I don't follow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0003
rows.name: We wish to speak to you of a slight problem...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0004
rows.name: Hm. Tatsu will LISTEN for free...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0005
rows.name: Truly a Nopon's Nopon, it pains me to say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_JNK0010
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: qev086201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask L if profits are down.

rows.label: qev086201_JNK0020
rows.name: Assume

rows.label: qev086201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if L is having trouble with loan sharks.

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0006
rows.name: What?! Perish the thought in a horrible fire![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0006_2
rows.name: Sales are wonderful, thanks to New LA's kind citizens![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0007
rows.name: If anything, we would consider EXPANDING our business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Heavenly no! It has always been our policy
to run a debt-free business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0009
rows.name:
We'd be happy to hear your problem
AND help out if we can, L.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0010
rows.name: Splendid! We thank you for deciding in our favor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0011
rows.name: So! As it happens, we invent things in our spare time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0012
rows.name: Whoaaa, really? What sort of things do you make?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0013
rows.name: We're very pleased you asked![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0014
rows.name:
...And we'd be equally pleased to answer,
were it not a trade secret.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh, come on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0016
rows.name: So then what was it you wanted help with, L?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Unfortunately, we've been unable to procure
the materials necessary for our tinkering.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Resources were more plentiful
when we lived in Noctilum, you see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well, yeah, here in the city, we mostly have
finished products as opposed to raw materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0021
rows.name: Just so![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Yet the world beyond these walls is, as you say,
all about survival of the fattest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Gathering resources amid such brutality is
difficult for us...more intellectual types, we fear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0024
rows.name: Mmm, Tatsu know exactly what L mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0025
rows.name: He said "intellectual" not "ineffectual."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0026
rows.name:
All right, well, now I understand what you're asking for,
and I think we can help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0027
rows.name: Just let us know what you need, and we'll try to track it down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0028
rows.name: Ah, wonderful! Splendid![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0029
rows.name: Thank you so very much for stepping up to the full plate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0030
rows.name: Tatsu want more on his plate too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0031
rows.name: I...have no idea what you guys are talking about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0031_2
rows.name: But anyway, it sounds like we're going on a mission for L?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0032
rows.name: You know we're going to have to charge you for it, right, L?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086201_MSG0033
rows.name: Of course! And we will pay most handsome![ST:wait ]
